mdRecord.dcterms:description: Hartford Seminary had moved out of its buildings on Elizabeth Street and wanted to sell the campus. Over a two-year period, a broad coalition of legislators, University of Connecticut administrators, Dean Blumberg, faculty, students and trustees of Hartford Seminary lobbied for the State to purchase the Hartford Seminary campus for the Law School. ...The Law School moved to its current campus in the summer of 1984.... -- http://www.law.uconn.edu/about/uconn-law-history [work]
